about_the_game:
• Fight against your friends on one device
  • Obtain stronger weapons that are spawned on the levels
  • Each level offers different experience, fight in the desert, on top of castle, in hell etc.

BEWARE no Solo mode so far, you need at least one other player to play the game on your device!

The game is meant for 2 – 4 players on one physical device. They try to kill each other in 3 different modes. You can choose from several playable levels, with each of them being different with unique design and mechanics. You can also pick up randomly spawned weapons to gain competitive edge above your foes.

Game Modes:
  • Classic Deathmatch – game ends when one of the players reaches goal score, thus winning the match.
  • Timed Deathmatch – match lasts given amount of time, after the time limit is out players are ranked by the amount of players they killed.
  • Last Man Standing – each player has set amount of health points. As soon as the player is killed, one of his health points is lost. As soon as he reaches 0 health points he is out of the game and match continues until there is only one player left.
